alert.note: Alert for Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 1:07PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tippah County through 145 PM CDT... At 107 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Ripley, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walnut, Falkner, Chalybeate and Tiplersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
